msg: Display a context-relative path instead of absolute
disk pathname when jsp resource is not found.

author: remm
msg: - Should fix the inclusion problems. If a writer has already been used by the
including servlet, the default servlet will also use a writer to serve text files.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct WAR file expansion on Windows platforms.  Previously, the expansion
code was assuming that the passed URL was using forward slashes.  Now it makes
sure this is the case.

author: pierred
msg: Fix for the following bug:
"Requesting a non-existent JSP page returns an error 500
that reports a java.io.FileNotFoundException as the root cause."
A 404 should instead be sent back.
ParserController will now simply let a FileNotFoundException go
up the food chain so that JspServletWrapper::service() can
appropriately call response.sendError(HttpServletResponse.SC_NOT_FOUND...)
PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:
Reviewed by:

author: craigmcc
msg: Implement a non-standard request attribute that is set on named dispatcher
includes so that Jasper (or any other included servlet) can always tell
when it is executing inside an include, instead of a direct call.
For a path-based include, the included servlet should check for the
existence of the standard request attributes that are added.
